original_text: Then the priest must bring the woman in front of the Lord. The priest must make the woman's hair free. He must put into her hands the grain offering. That is the offering because the man does not trust his wife. The priest must hold the bowl that contains the bitter water. The bitter water brings a curse.
korean_text: 여인을 여호와 앞에 세우고 그의 머리를 풀게 하고 기억나게 하는 소제물 곧 의심의 소제물을 그의 두 손에 두고 제사장은 저주가 되게 할 쓴 물을 자기 손에 들고

sentences.original_text: Then the priest must bring the woman
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 제사장은 그 여자를 데려와야 합니다

sentences.original_text: The priest must make the woman's hair free
He must put into her hands the grain offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀의 손에 소물을 놓아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: because the man does not trust his wife
The priest must hold the bowl
The bitter water brings a curse
